query: SELECT count(*) as "count!" FROM campaign_requests WHERE (NOT $1::boolean OR id = $2::int4) AND (NOT $3::boolean OR id = ANY(CAST($4 as int4[])) ) AND (NOT $5::boolean OR account_id = $6::varchar) AND (NOT $7::boolean OR link = $8::varchar) AND (NOT $9::boolean OR unit_amount = $10::int4) AND (NOT $11::boolean OR unit_amount > $12::int4) AND (NOT $13::boolean OR unit_amount < $14::int4) AND (NOT $15::boolean OR price_per_point = $16::varchar) AND (NOT $17::boolean OR price_per_point > $18::varchar) AND (NOT $19::boolean OR price_per_point < $20::varchar) AND (NOT $21::boolean OR min_individual_reward = $22::varchar) AND (NOT $23::boolean OR min_individual_reward > $24::varchar) AND (NOT $25::boolean OR min_individual_reward < $26::varchar) AND (NOT $27::boolean OR max_individual_reward = $28::varchar) AND (NOT $29::boolean OR max_individual_reward > $30::varchar) AND (NOT $31::boolean OR max_individual_reward < $32::varchar) AND (NOT $33::boolean OR thumbs_up_only = $34::boolean) AND (NOT $35::boolean OR status = $36::campaign_request_status) AND (NOT $37::boolean OR stripe_session_url = $38::varchar) AND (NOT $39::boolean OR stripe_session_id = $40::varchar) AND (NOT $41::boolean OR campaign_id = $42::int4) AND (NOT $43::boolean OR created_at = $44::timestamptz)
